reviewText: Great family movie!! My girls can't get enough. Definitely a great family film that parents and kids will both enjoy!

A spiritual upbeat story . I was moved to tears and laughter . Every family in America and eventually the world should have a copy of this movie to remind themselves that life is uncertain but family is forever
Such a fun family film. Moving story w/ some pretty awesome actors.

If you are looking for family friendly entertainment with a great story, great acting and a "feel good" ending, this one will deliver all the above. Lance Henriksen was so believable as the tough old ranch owner and Allie DeBerry (Antfarm) delivered a thoroughly convincing performance as the "troubled teen with issues". Bought it at Walmart along with 2 other family titles last week. We enjoyed it.
GOOD MOVIE
Very pleased with item and service
Fairly average Class B movie.  Story is OK, but the production values lacked a lot when compared to a really good movie.
Enjoyable movie.
Nice uplifting movie
loved this movie the family did too
A movie that teaches at the same time...you will enjoy this movie.
Very heart warming. No swearing! Good family movie. Had a great being, loved that it brought the diasabled into it Awesome movie.
Great movie for how horses can heal a damaged heart
I thought it was an amazing movie. Go see it or rent it. It is a nice family story too.

Am OK movie to spend an evening with family and popcorn.
My kids loved this film!

My son and I loved this movie!  This is definitely a great family movie that teaches both children and parents an important lesson.....when you act out, there are consequences for your actions and punishments are what you make of them....taking a bad situation and making it into something is truly inspirational. I recommend this movie to anyone with kids (especially teens)!!
Great family film! Love seeing the positive effects that animals can have on humans, here it being the horses with this young, troubled girl. Very moving!
I really enjoyed this movie. My favorite aspect was the connection between Kacie and the horse. Also love that it is a Dove Foundation endorsed family film!!
Great for the whole family!! This is a moving story with relatable characters.
Enjoyed the movie , kids really liked it too.
For a movie with a Dove Seal, we wouldn't expect to see such immodest clothing on the lead character throughout the entire movie. A real disappointment.
I really like the movie. But of course I love movies with horses
